subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Richard Dutrow was barred for 10 years after the latest of nearly 70 violations in nine states, but he is fighting the charges and keeps winning on the track.
snippet: Richard Dutrow was barred for 10 years after the latest of nearly 70 violations in nine states, but he is fighting the charges and keeps winning on the track.
